name: ssl.mojo
description: The objective is to implement enough OpenSSL bindings to allow `HTTPS` connections.

scripts.test: quint test specs/tls13_protocol.qnt && quint test specs/tls13_record.qnt && quint test specs/crypto_hkdf.qnt && quint test specs/crypto_aead_gcm.qnt && quint test specs/crypto_x25519.qnt && quint test specs/crypto_sig_x509.qnt && quint test specs/tls_integration.qnt
